Posts.Content: Please can you elaborate on the form your phased return to work took... My workplace seems dis-satisfied with my ability to cope with work at the moment. I am on a phased return but they feel I am not progressing swiftly enough for them. Can I ask to be referred to occupational health ? Thx Daisyloobylou
Posts.Title: Sickness review - not sure what this means---- please help!!!!!
